comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Jan Heythekker (or Heithekker) directed operas at the Met. This site has him directing a production of Gotterdammerung that included conductor Artur Bodanzky (in a nearby photo) and Margarete Matzenauer (also in a nearby photo), 18 November 1915: archives.metoperafamily.org/archives/scripts/cgiip.exe/WS...[Director]&x=0&xhomepath=&xhome=
